title: CoFlow
description: Real-time MERN app with live hackathons, tasks, chat, push alerts for team projects.
keyFeatures: Built CoFlow with a teammate, a real-time hackathon discovery & team coordination platform
Implemented Real-time team chat & collaborative task tracking
Built an automated hackathons scraper using Node-Cron and Playwright for consistent event updates
Integrated Realtime Push-Notification Alerts using Redis
